instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2850 chime grey screen
threads.message: Board chimes but i get a grey screen when i connect to external i get nothing. What could be the issue?

threads.title: 820-2850 chime grey screen
threads.message: Damn too late i totally fucked vram up id need a stencil to get them back on properly at this point tried replacing them totally botched it.

threads.title: 820-2850 chime grey screen
threads.message:
I'm very sorry, I thought it could be related to vram because scoopof3d on youtube had similar issue on a compareable model and replacing vram fixed it for him, ill try and find the video

edit: here is the video [URL]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ANwi3UwTTfE&t=248s[/URL]

again, im very sorry

threads.title: 820-2850 chime grey screen
threads.message: Yeah right, residual heat reach GPU and make the LB work again, there was nothing wrong with VRAM....

threads.title: 820-2850 chime grey screen
threads.message: Oh well ive been meaning to start reballing chips like smcs anyone know where i can buy a vram stencil also that metal holder louis uses to keep smc in while reballing?

threads.title: 820-2850 chime grey screen
threads.message:
This is my IC holder I use, the smallest it fits is an SMC, anything smaller won't hold: 
[url]https://www.aliexpress.com/item/80-80mm-Stencils-Template-holder-jig-HT-80-silver-BGA-reballing-station/32776759559.html?spm=2114.13010708.0.0.8Mazmt[/url]

and i'm not sure which RAM style the mac has but it should be similar to one of these: 
[url]https://www.aliexpress.com/item/free-shipping-6pcs-lot-Directly-Heated-bga-stencils-DDR-DDR2-DDR2-2-DDR2-3-DDR3-DDR5/32313848756.html?spm=2114.search0104.3.2.4edc535fOCkBTp&ws_ab_test=searchweb0_0,searchweb201602_2_10152_10065_10151_10344_10068_10130_5722815_10324_10342_10547_10325_10343_10546_10340_10341_10548_5722915_10698_10545_10697_5722615_10696_10084_10083_10618_10307_5722715_5711215_10059_5723015_10534_308_100031_10103_441_10624_10623_10622_5711315_5722515_10621_10620,searchweb201603_32,ppcSwitch_5&algo_expid=8d8644cb-64e3-4372-b788-2780e803a9dd-0&algo_pvid=8d8644cb-64e3-4372-b788-2780e803a9dd&priceBeautifyAB=0[/url]
